original_text: “I will make this city safe and I will rescue it. I will do that to show that I am great. I promised my servant David that I would do it. So I will do it.” ’ The Lord destroys Assyria's army “I will make this city safe and I will rescue it. I will do that to show that I am great. I promised my servant David that I would do it. So I will do it.” ’ The Lord destroys Assyria's army “I will make this city safe and I will rescue it.
korean_text: 대저 내가 나를 위하며 내 종 다윗을 위하여 이 성을 보호하며 구원하리라 하셨나이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: I will make this city safe
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이 도시를 안전하게 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will do that to show that I am great
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 위대하다는 것을 보여주기 위해 그것을 할 것이다
